scripts.export:pull: bash -c "git subtree pull --squash --prefix third-party/WolcenExtractor git@github.com:gabriel-dehan/WolcenExtractor.git master && yarn export:install"
scripts.export:install: bash -c "gem install bundler && cd third-party/WolcenExtractor && bundle install"
scripts.export:cp: bash -c "rm -rf datamine && mkdir -p datamine && cd datamine.tmp && cp -r --parents localization/text_ui_Loot.xml Game/Umbra/Loot/Armors/{Armors,Accessories,Armors_unique,UniquesAccessories}* Game/Umbra/Loot/Weapons/{Unique,}{Weapons,Shields}* -t ../datamine/ && cd - && node ./src/import_datamine.js"
scripts.export: bash -c "cd third-party/WolcenExtractor && ruby src/main.rb extract --source \"`cat ../../GAMEPATH`\" --dest ../../datamine.tmp --only english_xml.pak,umbra.pak && yarn export:cp"
